titles.title: 347 My Savior Thou Hast Offered Rest (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My Savior Thou hast
Offered rest
Oh give it then to me
The rest of ceasing
From myself
To find my all in Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This cruel self
Oh how it strives
And works within
My breast
To come between Thee
And my soul
And keep me back
From rest

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How many subtle
Forms it takes
Of seeming verity
As if it were
Not safe to rest
And venture all
On Thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O Lord I seek
A holy rest
A victory over sin
I seek that Thou alone
Shouldst reign
O'er all without
Within

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
In Thy strong hand
I lay me down
So shall the work
Be done
For who can work
So wondrously
As the Almighty One

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Work on then Lord
Till on my soul
Eternal light shall break
And in Thy likeness
Perfected
I satisfied shall wake
